name: Survival Game Winter Island 3D
description:
It’s freezing chill and you have to deal with it and stay alive!

In Survival Game Winter Island you found yourself on a place, that doesn't seem like a lovely one. You are on an island that is covered with snow and the temperature is pretty low, so you can freeze to death! You will have to use all your skills to stay alive!

Survival Game Winter Island is a great place for those who think they are pretty skilled survivors. It won’t be easy for you, so you’d better be prepared! Look around for useful resources, craft weapons and armour and when you will be ready hunt on the elder dragon from ancient tales! Become the king of this forgotten land!

Survival Game Winter Island game features:
+ Cool winter island theme
+ Hunt animals – deer, rabbits, wolves, bears, boars
+ Build your own shelter
+ Beautiful 3D graphics

If you are a survival games fan, if you want to test your survival skills and knowledge, then this game is perfect for you! Survival Game Winter Island grants you great adventure, full of amazing and dangerous sights! Good luck and have fun!
